details.title: CSI @ SJCET
details.brief: The Computer Society of India (CSI) Student Branch at SJCET is a vibrant platform for students passionate about technology and innovation.
details.details: As part of India’s largest association of IT professionals, CSI @ SJCET provides opportunities for students to explore computing, AI, data science, and emerging technologies. We host workshops, hackathons, seminars, and expert talks that bridge the gap between academics and industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.brief: Inspiring innovation and research among students.
mission.details: Empower students by nurturing technical expertise, fostering collaboration, and connecting them with industry mentors—so they grow as innovators, leaders, and problem solvers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.brief: Building the next generation of technology leaders.
vision.details: Position CSI @ SJCET as a hub of technological excellence where students push boundaries, embrace lifelong learning, and create societal impact through computing.
